p:
We use the empirical Bayes framework proposed by Brooks et al. [ 6] to forecast each predictor time series (from itself). It assumes that future seasons will resemble past seasons with pre-defined transformations. Let f denote the seasonal curve for a given data source and season. We assume that the value for the ith week is
f
( i )
≜ f
( i )
+
ϵ i
, where f is an underlying seasonal trend and ϵ
i ∼ N(0, σ) is a Gaussian error term.
